summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Ad Hoc Judicial Nominating Committee of the City of Dallas will convene on November 20, 2024, at 9:00 AM in the Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall. The meeting will also be accessible via video conference. The primary purpose is to discuss the appointment of full-time Municipal Judges and Associate Judges.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting held on June 25, 2024.
2. Consideration of recommendations from the Judicial Nominating Commission regarding the vacant full-time Municipal Judge and Associate Judge positions.

**Important Details**:  
The committee will enter an executive session to deliberate on the potential appointment and employment of judges, as permitted under Section 551.074 of the Texas Open Meetings Act. This session allows for confidential discussions regarding personnel matters.

**Action Items**:  
The committee seeks to approve the recommendations for the vacant judicial positions based on the findings of the Judicial Nominating Commission. Additionally, the approval of the previous meeting's minutes is required.

The meeting will be broadcast live, and public attendance is encouraged, either in person or virtually.
